ext_descriptions.ext_description: An interconnect_module_design_object_category lists the types of the categories of the interconnect module design.
specifies that category is assembly component category;
specifies that category is embedded physical component terminal category;
specifies that category is interconnect module via;
specifies that category is interconnect module inter stratum feature;
specifies that category is interconnect module cutout;
specifies that category is interconnect module fill area;
specifies that category is interconnect module stratum feature;
A lam_product_design_object_category lists the categories of the PCA product design object.
specifies that an instance that in this category is an implementation of the assembly component;
specifies that an instance that in this category is an implementation of the assembly module;
specifies that an instance that in this category is an implementation of the assembly module component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the assembly module component terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the assembly module macro component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the assembly module macro component join terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the bare die component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the bare die component terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the bonded conductive base blind via;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the buried via;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the cable component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the component feature;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the component mounting feature;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the component termination passage;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the component termination passage and contact size dependent land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the component termination passage and contact size dependent non functional land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the component termination passage dependent land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the component termination passage dependent non functional land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the component termination passage interface terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the component termination passage join terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the conductive interconnect element terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the conductive interconnect element with pre defined transitions;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the conductive interconnect element with user defined single transition;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the connected area component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the contact size dependent land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the contact size dependent non functional land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the cutout;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the cutout edge segment;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the dielectric material passage;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the electrical isolation laminate component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the embedded physical component terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the fiducial;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the fill area;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the inter stratum feature;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect component interface terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect component join terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect module component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect module component stratum based terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect module component surface feature;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect module component terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect module edge;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect module edge segment;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect module macro component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interconnect module macro component join terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interface access material removal feature;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interface access stratum feature template component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interface component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the interfacial connection;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the internal probe access area;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the join two physical connectivity definition supporting inter stratum feature;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the join two physical connectivity definition supporting printed component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the laminate component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the generic laminate text component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the laminate text string component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the land interface terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the land join terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the material removal laminate component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the minimally defined component terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the movable packaged component join terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the multi layer material removal laminate component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the multi layer stratum feature template component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the multi layer stratum special symbol component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the non conductive base blind via;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the non functional land;

specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the packaged component;

specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the packaged connector component interface terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the partially plated cutout;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the partially plated interconnect module edge;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the physical component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the physical connectivity interrupting cutout;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the physical laminate component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the physical network supporting inter stratum feature;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the plated conductive base blind via;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the plated cutout;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the plated cutout edge segment;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the plated interconnect module edge;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the plated interconnect module edge segment;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the plated passage;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the plated passage or unsupported passage;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the primary stratum indicator symbol;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the printed component join terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the printed connector component interface terminal;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the probe access area;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the routed interconnect component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the routed physical component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the single stratum special symbol component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the stratum feature;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the stratum feature template component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the thermal isolation laminate component;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the unrouted conductive interconnect element;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the unsupported passage;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the unsupported dependent land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the unsupported passage dependent non functional land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the via;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the via and contact size dependent land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the via and contact size dependent non functional land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the via dependent land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the via dependent non functional land;
specifies that an instance that is in this category is an implementation of the via terminal.
A spacing_type lists the types of the spacing.
specifies that spacing is measured between nearest boundaries of the design items indicated;
specifies that spacing is measured between centroids of the design items indicated;
specifies that spacing is measured between furthest boundaries of the design items indicated.

ext_description.p:
A Area_qualified_layout_spacing_requirement is a type of
that describes the physical spacing between one of an interconnect_module_cutout, an interconnect_module_fill_area, an interconnect_module_inter_stratum_feature, an interconnect_module_stratum_feature, or an interconnect_module_via, and another of these categories of design objects. This Application object qualifies the spacing requirement to apply within a given context as defined by a set of . The category names correspond to the category of equivalent application object names as described in . This requirement shall be interpreted as applying to the categories of those objects.
ext_description.note: A pair of categories is used for this requirement occurrence.
ext_description.example:
In domain terms, when a Via to Via spacing is to be greater than 5 mm, the encoding will be that the spacing between the
whose value is interconnect_module_via and the
whose value is interconnect_module_via shall be greater than 5 mm.

In domain terms, when the distance from a cutout to a trace must be greater than 5 mm, the encoding will be that the spacing between the
whose value is interconnect_module_cutout and the
whose value is interconnect_module_stratum_feature shall be greater than 5 mm.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
specifies an
for the Area_qualified_layout_spacing_requirement. The area_context establishes a context within which the spacing requirement is to be met. There shall be one or more
for a Area_qualified_layout_spacing_requirement. The
may overlap. All
specified shall be in the same design.

An Interconnect_module_constraint_region is a type of . An Interconnect_module_constraint_region is a region within an in which a placement constraint on some category of design object is to be met by the design. An Interconnect_module_constraint_region may overlap other Interconnect_module_constraint_regions.

ext_description.p:
an attribute is an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Interconnect_module_constraint_region is dependent on the existence of the
that specifies the Interconnect_module_constraint_region as its
shape element. There shall be zero or one
for an Interconnect_module_constraint_region. The usage of this relationship is to enable traceability to original Interconnect_module_constraint_region during design iterations.
ext_description.note: Since the Interconnect_module_constraint_region is dependent on a specific , it is not possible to use the mechanism of associating one Interconnect_module_constraint_region with several , each of which is for a different design version. In addition, the non_conformant_interconnect_module_design_object is for objects within the associated_definition, which also precludes direct re-use of the same Interconnect_module_constraint_region. It is expected that only the first Interconnect_module_constraint_region populated would have an associated shape to eliminate the need for carrying redundant shape data.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
specifies the
for the Interconnect_module_constraint_region. There may be more than one
for an Interconnect_module_constraint_region. The names shall be interpreted as the identification of A pplication Object categories to be constrained.
an inherited attribute that shall have a value of type .

specifies the
as the extent of for the Interconnect_module_constraint_region. There shall be one or more
for an Interconnect_module_constraint_region. The
shall all be for the same associated_definition.
specifies the string for the Interconnect_module_constraint_region. The design_specific_purpose identifies the purpose the enterprise defined for the Interconnect_module_constraint_region.

specifies the
for the Interconnect_module_constraint_region. There shall be one or more
for each Interconnect_module_constraint_region. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies if the meaning of the Interconnect_module_constraint_region is to describe that items shall be in the interior of the
or shall be on the exterior of the . The value of TRUE states that objects in the constrained_design_object_category are not to be within the . The value of FALSE states that objects in the constrained_design_object_category are to be only within the .

an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Interconnect_module_constraint_region is dependent on the existence of the
that specifies the Interconnect_module_constraint_region as its . There shall be exactly one
for an Interconnect_module_constraint_region.
If precedent_version_constraint_region exists, it will refer Interconnect_module_constraint_region as .

The
shall not be populated.

Each non conforming design object that is a
shall be in the scope of the Interconnect_module_constraint_region.

ext_description.p:
A Layer_qualified_layout_spacing_requirement is a type of
that describes the physical spacing between one of an interconnect_module_cutout, an interconnect_module_fill_area, an interconnect_module_inter_stratum_feature, an interconnect_module_stratum_feature, or an interconnect_module_via, and another of these categories of design objects. This Application object qualifies the spacing requirement to apply within a given context as defined by a set of . The category names correspond to the category of equivalent application object names as described in . This requirement shall be interpreted as applying to the categories of those objects.
ext_description.note: A pair of categories is used for this requirement occurrence.
ext_description.example:
In domain terms, when a Via to Via spacing is to be greater than 5 mm, the encoding will be that the spacing between the
whose value is interconnect_module_via and the
whose value is interconnect_module_via shall be greater than 5 mm.

In domain terms, when the distance from a cutout to a trace must be greater than 5 mm, the encoding will be that the spacing between the
whose value is interconnect_module_cutout and the
whose value is interconnect_module_stratum_feature shall be greater than 5 mm.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
specifies an
for the Layer_qualified_layout_spacing_requirement. The layer_context establishes a context within which the spacing requirement is to be met. There shall be one or more
for a Layer_qualified_layout_spacing_requirement. The
may overlap. All
specified shall be in the same design.

A Layout_spacing_contextual_area is a type of . A Layout_spacing_contextual_area is the region on an
where mounting restrictions for components exist. The shape representing the mounting restriction region shall have an origin that is congruent with the origin of the shape representing the . This congruency shall be accomplished using concepts equivalent to the Application objects
or . The shape representing the Layout_spacing_contextual_area is itself in the shape of the assembly, as is the shape of the . The congruency requirement is established so that an application interface can unambiguously import the Layout_spacing_contextual_area into a CAD layout tool. Layout_spacing_contextual_area is part of a design requirement for an interconnect that is established in the assembly or assemblies in which the interconnect is used.

specifies a role of the
for the Layout_spacing_contextual_area. The type of surface is determined by the definition of the
specified by reference_surface. The reference_surface conveys design intent to identify the component that implements the connectivity prescribed by the relevant member of .
an inherited attribute that shall have a value of types .

ext_description.p:
The inherited from the
shall be a .

ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Layout_spacing_requirement_non_conforming_design_object is a means to specify one or more design object that does not meet object to object spacing requirements for the printed circuit board layout. There is no priority or sequential encoding intended by ending the attribute names with "1" or "2".

specifies a role of the
for the Layout_spacing_requirement_non_conforming_design_object

ext_description.p:
specifies one role of the
for the Layout_spacing_requirement_non_conforming_design_object.

specifies one role of the
for the Layout_spacing_requirement_non_conforming_design_object.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
specifies the
for the Layout_spacing_requirement_non_conforming_design_object. There shall be one or more
for each Layout_spacing_requirement_non_conforming_design_object.

specifies a role of the
for the Layout_spacing_requirement_non_conforming_design_object. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies a role of the
for the Layout_spacing_requirement_non_conforming_design_object. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
specifies a logical value.
There shall exist violation_value or violation_shape, but not both.

A Layout_spacing_requirement is a type of
that describes the physical spacing requirement between one of an assembly_module_assembly_component, an assembly_module_component_feature, an interconnect_module_cutout, an interconnect_module_fill_area, an interconnect_module_design_intent_modification, an interconnect_module_inter_stratum_feature, an interconnect_module_cutout_edge_segment, an interconnect_module_interconnect_module_edge, an interconnect_module_interconnect_module_edge_segment, an interconnect_module_plated_cutout, an interconnect_module_plated_cutout_edge_segment, an interconnect_module_plated_interconnect_module_edge, an interconnect_module_plated_interconnect_module_edge_segment, an interconnect_module_plated_passage, a category consisting of the union of an interconnect_module_plated_passage category and an interconnect_module_plated_unsupported_passage category, an interconnect_module_unsupported_passage, an interconnect_module_stratum_feature, or an interconnect_module_via, and another of these categories of design objects. The requirement shall be imposed between the boundaries of members of the the relevant categories or between centroids.
The category names correspond to the category of equivalent application object names.
Support for requirements between boundaries and centroids is not supported by this part of ISO 10303.
Assembly_module_assembly_component corresponds to category. Assembly_module_component_feature corresponds to category. Interconnect_module_cutout corresponds to category. Interconnect_module_inter_stratum_feature corresponds to category. Interconnect_module_stratum_feature corresponds to category. Interconnect_module_via corresponds to category.
Any subtype of an item in a category shall qualify as part of that category.
This part of ISO 10303 supports several spacing requirements in this Application Object.
A pair of categories is used for this requirement occurrence.
In domain terms, when a Via to Via spacing is to be greater than 5 mm, the encoding will be that the spacing between the design_object_category_1 whose value is interconnect_module_via and the design_object_category_2 whose value is interconnect_module_via shall be greater than 5 mm.
In domain terms, when the distance from a cutout to a trace must be greater than 5 mm, the encoding will be that the spacing between the design_object_category_1 whose value is interconnect_module_cutout and the design_object_category_2 whose value is interconnect_module_stratum_feature shall be greater than 5 mm.

specifies the
for the Layout_spacing_requirement.

an attribute inherited from the
supertype specifies a role of the for the Layout_spacing_requirement.

specifies the
for the Layout_spacing_requirement.

specifies the
for the Layout_spacing_requirement.

A Stratum_constraint_region is a type of
included to constrain one or more
to specific regions in the interconnect design. The Stratum_constraint_region is an area based concept. The Stratum_constraint_region may constrain the relevant
to be contained within the region. The Stratum_constraint_region may constrain the relevant
to be excluded from the region.

ext_description.p:
specifies one role of the
for the Stratum_constraint_region. Realized material shall not violate the constraint. There shall exist one or more Stratums for the Stratum_constraint_region.
ext_description.note: In a CAD system is it usual industrial practice for some small geometric overlap of design vs constraints due to construction geometry and side effects associated therein. This Application Object constrains finished material.

ext_description.p: specifies a STRING defined by the user organization to convey the purpose of the constraint. When unused, the value of the STRING shall be ''.
ext_description.note: Information exchange agreements between industrial partners may use this attribute as necessary.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies a BOOLEAN value. A value of TRUE indicates that realized material shall be excluded from the region. A value of FALSE indicates that realized material shall be contained only within the region.

ext_description.p:
specifies one role of the
for the Stratum_constraint_region.
specified as non_conformant_stratum violate the constraint. There may be one or more Stratums for the Stratum_constraint_region. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
ext_description.note:
The number of non_conformant_stratum will likely vary during typical design flow. A design organization may choose to establish metrics based on the design flow for the interconnect products being designed. The context of the
specified by scope may be used as a mechanism to retrieve the relevant context and metric. More detailed metrics than conformance are outside the scope of this part of ISO 10303.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: an inherited attribute that shall have a value of type . This value establishes the design context for the Stratum_constraint_region.

ext_description.p:
an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Stratum_constraint_region is dependent on the existence of the
that specifies the Stratum_constraint_region as its . There shall be no more than one
for an Stratum_constraint_region. The precedent_version_constraint_region is included to support the case that there are multiple versions of the design included in one database and specifies the constraint region assigned to the previous version of the design if there is a difference between the constraint regions for the previous design version and the current design version.
ext_description.note: Usual industrial practice is to focus on one version of an interconnect at a time and therefore this attribute is not usually populated.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Stratum_constraint_region is dependent on the existence of the
that specifies the Stratum_constraint_region as its . There shall be exactly one
for a Stratum_constraint_region. A requirement provides the semantic or rationale behind the constraint, usually for archival purposes.

ext_description.p: If there is a precedent_version_constraint_region provided then a Stratum_constraint_region shall be related to this Stratum_constraint_region by the relationship.

The
being constrained by the region shall contribute to the definition of the
referenced by the associated_definition.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The valid_non_conformant_design_object_context function returns true if there are no Laminate_components in input1 or if the assembly context of the items in input1 includes input2.
the specified set of .
the specified .

The valid_non_conformant_stratum_context function returns TRUE if the set of
included in input1 are related by an assembly relationship to the
specified as input2.
the specified set of Stratums.
the specified .
